comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: No "H" in Almici -- see caption on the photo.

comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: Pope Pius X had a heart attack in 1913; perhaps this picture is related to that event.

comment.author: 35277872@N05
comment._content: Thanks for the information.  The date inscribed in the upper right corner of the negative, 7/12/13, may indeed indicate that the photo was used in relation to Pope Pius X's heart attack in that year.  We'll correct the spelling in the description when we update it.

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: This is Dr. Andrea Amici (not Almici or Almichi), see e.g. fultonhistory.com/newspaper%202/Auburn%20NY%20Citizen/Aub..., column 1 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83045487/1913-04-11/ed-... A drawing of him in 1926 in newspapers.nl.sg/Digitised/Article/straitstimes19261115-1...
